Package mireka.filter

Interface Summary
DataRecipientFilter a simpler alternative to Filter.
Filter Implementing classes are active parts of a filter chain.
FilterBase don't implement this interface directly, use the descendant interfaces and the implementing abstract classes
FilterChain  
FilterType  
MailData Represents the material transmitted after the SMTP DATA command is accepted and before the end of data indication is transmitted.
MailTransaction  
 

Class Summary
AbstractDataRecipientFilter  
AbstractFilter  
DataRecipientFilterAdapter Adapts a DataRecipientFilter to the Filter interface
StatelessFilterType Note: implementing classes must be thread safe, because they can be used by multiple connections at the same time.
 

Enum Summary
FilterReply
